content.detailedDescription: Early one morning i was awoken by strange foot steps coming from my drive way to my bedroom window. i then discoverd an eight foot tall sliver robot like man trying to greet me. i was actually on four on the bed i was awoken from at 5a.M. for years i've seen or heard of some type of alien life forms contacting us. we live near mcx campendleton, i also dicoverd an article on marpat camoflage gear ,fcs  i some what study astronomy.
content.summary: Andriod  human machine scout robot man

content.detailedDescription:
While admiring the clear night sky, looking in a southerly direction, my friend and i were amazed to see a huge fireball streak through the sky from a north to south direction, and then explode.  it was 9:05pm edt.  the flash of light lit up the sky, and was blinding.  

the object was larger than my thumb nail at arms length.

a shock wave hit two minutes later at 9:07pm edt.  it lasted for .5 seconds and was like a thunder clap in the distance.

we were both amazed and awed by the experience.

tw
content.summary: Massive fireball explodes then shock wave two minutes later

content.detailedDescription: Lets start off by saying i am not nuts--i came home pulled up into my driveway walked to the backdoor of my home..Witch face north and while unlocking my door i looked directly behind me and of in the distance i noticed a very bold light that did not perform normal flying motions.A solid light light would go west for 5 seconds and then would sharply almost instantly go east,very crazy also did this a couple of times sometimes would do a impossible curve turn that can not be done that fast no way.Like i said i am not nuts and even if no body believes me that is fine cause i was there ans seen something i will never forget and that is all i need. thank you
content.summary: Amazing display of technolgy

content.detailedDescription:
Attn: dispatcher - the following is my mufon field investigator report for a sighting i personally received outside of the mufon cms and is being submitted in accordance with mufon policy and should not be considered a "second hand" report, as it was investigated first-hand by a certified mufon field investigator who is part of mufon. the witness' contact information has not been given for this case, since the investigation has already been completed by a mufon field investigator and the witness does not need to be contacted again with a preliminary questionnaire.

mufon ufo sighting field investigator report by mufon va fi/sip:

the witness was standing on his mother���s front porch with his son and daughter when his son drew his attention to an object in the daytime sky.  the witness first thought he was looking at the full moon when he first glanced at the object, as that is how large the object was in the sky.  the witness saw a very large, round sphere that was extremely bright orange in color, like the shade of an orange fruit.  the object was completely and evenly round.  the sphere was glowing with the color orange evenly over the surface of the object.  the sphere also had an aura extending outward evenly around the orb of a dimmer color orange that looked to be about one-sixth of the diameter of the object.  the witness also compared the color of the sphere to that of a harvest moon.  the approximate size of the sphere was that of an aspirin when held at arms length.  it was about 45 degrees above the horizon and very high in the sky, being at about the same altitude as a jet would travel that would leave contrails.  the object was moving in a straight line, slower than a plane travels.  the sphere crossed approximately 110 degrees of the sky in its flight path after the witness first noticed the object.  the object left no trail when crossing the sky and also made no sound whatsoever.  the witness observed it until it disappeared into the suburban tree line.  the witness stated that later a plane came overhead and had no reflection from the sun on it, so this verified that the object was indeed glowing with its own luminescence.
content.summary: A very large, bright glowing orange sphere, perfectly round, traveling very slowly, with an aura of dimmer orange around the outside of the sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving back to my home at 2:58pm, after i had picked my son up from the bus stop.
at the top of the hill getting ready to turn onto our street i stopped my vehicle as i saw the object hovering in the air.
the object was hovering in the air above the vineyard valley below, i sat watching the object hover and noticing the structure and trying to determine what it was.  i was connected with sticks, strings or a structure forming a triangle.
i saw the object and my son accompanying me in the truck saw it as well and he saw it streak across the sky.
content.summary: 3 silver / white orbs connected together in triangle shape hovering in the sky and then zipped away

content.detailedDescription: I was near the chinese restaurant "la muraglia" in ivrea, italy, a bright yellow ball in the sky, his flight path was regular but sometimes change his speed, after 3 minutes the light desappear, in this zone in frequently see this phenomenon for the people especially in turin is the routine, the object was at 3000 ft from land and mantain the speed like a charter with sometimes any accelerated, i'm sorry for my english,
content.summary: A tipical foofighter yellow bright light

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 8:30 pm york pa

my daughter saw bright lights out the living room window and went to the door.

she called me saying "what is that?!"

no sound at all.

when i went to the front door, there were two orangish lights in a vertical position with approx 25 ft of space between them, but to the eye in looked much closer.

then the lights turned in unison to a horizontal position, while in the same spot in the air. it was not moving, it was hovering

i told my daughter to grab the video camera. by the time she got outside the lights were in the horizontal position and my son grabbed the phone for me to call my parents who live down the street. i told then to go outside and look up. they went out and they both saw it too. the exact same thing we were seeing.

the lights began moving apart as if whatever was between them was getting bigger, growing in size

it was still hovering and turned so that one light was pointed south and the other was pointed north

the lights kept spreading apart (or getting bigger) and very slowly moved south

then one light went out and then the other went out

no sound the entire time it was there

we have the lights on video. all that is visible is the lights unless some sort of enhancement can be done to reveal more of what we could not see. the video was shot by my 13 year old and she was scared and shaking the camera, as well as zooming in and out, so it looks different than the details of what we saw in person.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 lights vertical to each other approx 25 ft apart above neighbors house, lights moved in unison horizontally and object grew in size

content.detailedDescription:
September 20, 2009 @ approx. 8:00 p.M.
the skies were dark and clear. my wife and i left the house to walk the dog as usual. we got to the corner of the street and began to walk across.  i was half way across when i heard the thrust of an engine which seemed to be twice as loud as usual. i looked up in all directions thinking that it was a low flying passenger jet and saw nothing. the engine thrust lasted 5 to 7 seconds. i then looked stright up and saw a brilliant white light that seemed narrow in diameter. best description of light-take a laser pointer, change color to white, eliminate beam of light and look directly into light. there seemed to be what looked like static electricity form posibbly underneath for about 3 to 4 seconds then stopped.The object started to slowly move and i caught a split second look at what seemed to be a wing. i yelled at my wife to look at the object as it started to accelerate. as it started to move 3 lights came into view. as in a jet airliner, left blink followed immediately by right blink. the count 1 missippi for the 3rd light. this continued as it crossed the horizon. the object was noiseless as it moved. it moved from a crawl and within 5 seconds it moved like a japanese super train. it came to a stop at a certain point, but before it did, what seemed to be static electricity was flashing from left to right side. the object appeared to stop and hover and had a blinking light as it stayed in that position.  i took a step down from the curb to cross back to the other side of the street. when i stepped down, i looked over and saw that the object had moved what seemed to from a 45 to 90 degree angle and still had a blinking light. when i got to the other side of the street, i looked back and noticed that the light changed form a blinking to a solid light, the same as i initially observed. i talked things over with my wife and she mentioned the fact the for some reason, there was no traffic during this observation. the street that intersects as well as our street has a good amount of traffic at any given time. it seems as if we were in a time warp, if there is such a thing. also, in the horizon where the object stopped is where i always see planes taking off form the airport. neither may wife or i remember seeing any flights taking.
content.summary: Engine noise, bright light, incredible speed, hovering before accerleration.

content.detailedDescription: I work next to aafb and i went outside on the deck for a break.  i noticed alot of clouds in the sky but one in particular was not moving.  it stayed in the same position as the other clouds moved by.  i kept watching it and one of the jets from aafb flew below it. at this time it was like it released a mist underneath it.  i could not take my eyes off of it because it was so strange.  i noticed an object silver in color and moving very fast over it.  it was round.  when this moved over it it looked like a mist came from the top of it.  more clouds started coming by and it stayed in the same position.  i went to see if i could find a camera, but when i went back outside it was like it was disappating itself.  i have seen round silver objects above this area before and watching them at first thought they were balloons, but one would disappear and then reappear and then the other would do the same.  i was reading on the recent ufo cases and found a picture that i will attach of the cloud that i saw that someone else caught on film from korea.  i could not believe how much it looked like what i had seen.
content.summary: Looked like a cloud

content.detailedDescription: As i was looking out my southern window about 6:35 am, i saw a huge bright star.  i realized it was too big to be a star and i thought it might be a reflection from something in the house so i went outside and it was definitely a bright light low in altitude.  it was light out and no other stars were visible.  i went back inside to call my brother who lives 6 miles east and noted the time was 6:40.  i went back outside and it appeared to be molten when it "dripped" down and formed another star of equal size.  now there are two.  the bottom one moved slowly to be above the other.  the bottom one which seemed to be the original star then faded slowly and moved away to the south.  the top one then did the same.
content.summary: Large star appeared after sunrise, no other stars visible in southern sky.  dripped into another star shape.  now 2 equal sized stars.  bottom one moved above other and then lower star gradually faded and moved away.  then top one faded

content.detailedDescription: I located this from a map put out by dean coomes @ bible-codes.Org.It led me here .It is marked on the earth so as to be able to locate it.I will send coordinates.It is round and had 2 square items on side of it,like an igloo.It blends in to back ground.8200-8600 feet.I was hurt hiking to it,sprained knees.Aerial view only.It may be the seed pod of noah
content.summary: Found object via map in bible, searching for noah's ark.Following ground markers led to this.

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday evening sept 20 2009 i had just reached my destination in wolverine michigan and opened up the cottage.  at 9:00 pm i stepped out on the deck to call my wife to let her know i had arrived all right and while i was talking to her i was gazing at the stars as i do often in the clear north sky.  while i was looking i spotted what i thought was a satellite running from southwest to northeast.  as i watched it seemed to have a slight wobble to its pattern that i figured was do to a spinning motion in orbit and the reflection from the sun like an optical illusion.   this all changed in my mind when the object i was watching stopped just above the horizon (maybe if you used your hand in front of you and stacked four fingers from the horizon line to the object you would have the rough area.)  this object stopped briefly and then reversed along the same line to rise in the sky up a short distance and then stop again.  this object stayed in this location for at least a half hour but this is not the only one i saw.  i spotted what i thought (and may have been) another satellite moving in the same area in the northern sky near this object.  it moved from the west to north and just as it reached a parallel (from my perspective) it vanished.  i know that this is not unusual with satellites as they cross they will lose the reflection of the sun but this object was still high and centered enough to be getting the solid reflection.

while i was watching the object a very bright intense flash from behind me distracted me.  i turned and spotted this flash in the south sky.  this flash was not regular, i would see like one flash then a pause then three quick flashes.  this was at 9:20pm and only lasted a minute or two and then the flash moved directly east of me in a heartbeat.  there were a couple flashes than it stopped.  so i went back to keeping an eye on the original object that was still in the same location.

at 9:30pm while i watched the original object i kept scanning the sky for the flash or now anything else.  after a couple planes went overhead i took a glance at the west and spotted a much lower very bright white spot.  this object moved in from the west to the east and i thought it may be a plane but there were no navigation lights.  this object moved slowly in a straight path to directly overhead and then faded out and gone.  this was not a satellite as it was way to low in the lower atmosphere.  i am also convinced it was not a plane as the final view was solid white and i was under it so i would have seen the navigation lights easily.  this was a glowing orb!  with this a few moments later the original object vanished.

while all this was going on my wife logged on and found some similar reports on the net of these objects located in northern michigan at the same time.  very odd!   i was sober and it was a very odd experience!
content.summary: Multiple objects sighted over a half hour to 45 min time frame.

content.detailedDescription: In edge of town, northen area of salt lake valley, park like area, where lights are dim, i clearly saw the ship directly over head. seeing clearly for 15 or so minutes. i was on a refreshing fresh air walk for evening. i planned to be out as long as i wanted walking in nice summer evening. i was glad to be seeing so clearly and up close an extraterrestial ship until i realized it could see me as clearly also. i felt very strongly it being a grays ship and rushed home as quickly as i could because my fear of the grays is huge.
content.summary: At low altitude, 500 or so feet. a house sized v shaped definitely not stealth bomber air craft overhead at very slow speed.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving nw on factory shops blvd coming home from the grocery store and saw a big ball of light moving fast towards me, then reversed course without turning around to do so.  it jogged quickly between north and south directions and resumed its path headed south.  it was only about 200 feet at most above the meadows subdivision.  there weren't any blinking lights or any clear outline, just a very bright ball of light,without any sound whatsoever, about dime-size in the sky.  i noticed a cop sitting at santa fe and atrium drive, facing santa fe, seemingly watching it.  he was sitting there with his lights on, without anyone pulled over, facing the whole thing.  i couldn't see if it was a douglas county cop or a castle rock cop.  i called my wife as i pulled into our parking lot and she went onto our deck and saw it for about 5 seconds as it zoomed by.  then it just seemed to completely disappear, but stayed low the entire time.

funny enough, we just came back from new mexico this past weekend and caught another strange occurence on film (we've already submitted that report and photos).  so, to see two very strange things so close together in the same week is exciting and unnerving.

i wish i would've had a camera so i could've gotten a picture, but even if i had, it was so quick i don't think it would've mattered.

thanks.
content.summary: Low, fast-flying fireball, changing directions mid-air

content.detailedDescription:
Was walking out of work at university of portland about 3 0r 4 after the hour when i heard a jet roar but i didnt see a jet i saw two triangles one was following the other.The second was trying to keep up with the other one and was going fast then suddendly slowed down.The lights were plusating slowly.Then i noticed no planes in the area then about 25 after the hour a plane flew by then  60 seconds later a white light appeared to be heading the same direction as the two triangles
1.I was at the university of portland and was heading home
2.I heard a jet roar but no jet was there.
3.I was sure what it was then i saw the shapes of triangels
4.They were both triangles one was being chased by the other.The second was catching up to the frist one and was able to then slowed down in seconds..
5.I was excited and stunned i just stood there watching.I thought it was really cool.
6.It flew behind some buildings out of sight.
content.summary: Two triangles two red lights on the bottom on red on top on each triangle

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside with dog.  when i looked up i saw 1 bright sphere and light,green in color heading northwest towards me.  the were two other dimmer lights converging on the sphere.  direction of objects 40 mi southeast of tucson and davis monthan afb. i initially thought it was an airliner heading for the "suns arrival" into phoenix airport. i had noticed that there were no additional position lights, and the two other ojects were dimly lit with a slight reddish silver tint.  as a trained airline pilot, i found it odd that there was no starboard green or port side red, and the white marker beacon was non-existent.  this got my attention.  once the objects converged upon the brightest, the two dimmer spheres encircled it several times, and then dramtically increased in brightness.  after several "spins" at a high rate of speed (and it seemed they were accelerating in the rotations)in extremely close proximity to one another, the brightest (green) remained stationary, while the two other spheres accelerated to what appeared to be "pre-set points" to form a perfect right triangle in unison.  once the other two spheres broke from the green, the green sphere went dim. the spheres were stopped on "points" estimated at 40 miles apart.  estimated altitude of objects 60,000 feet.  size of all objects at estimated altitude would approximate the visible size of an md80 at 30000 feet of altitude. the spheres remained stationary, yet the right triangle began to rotate slowly in a clockwise motion while maintaining spacing and triangular shape.  once the sphere encircled the green, and broke for the "points" the neighborhood dogs, coyotes, and even my dog began to howl, bark, and whine.  this was also pretty strange.  the dogs and coyotes continued to howl for about 8 minutes, my dog was very nervous and "whining" and wanted to go in.  
i watched for several minutes, and called my son out to look.  he immediately spotted the triangle and noticed a slow clockwise rotation of the triangle using the green object as a reference point.  the objects maintained what appear to be a perfect formation.  i went inside, and came out about 10 minutes later and the "triangle of objects" was gone.
there were 3 very distinct objects, and very discernable as "spheres".  there was no sound audible to my ears, and the neighborhood was void of city noises, but "something" clearly agitated every dog and coyote around for 8 minutes or so. after the objects disappeared, the animals quited down.

my feelings after watching these objects are of wonderment.  i was amazed at the sheer speed and the acceleration of these objects.  it took them maybe 4 seconds to travel from the green object to "set points" estimated at 40 miles apart, and then come to a very distinct " on a dime" stop. the precision and timing of the maneuver was nothing short of amazing.  the only odd feeling that had was the reations of the animals.  the noises that they were making were not your "normal" barks and coyote "yips".  it was just odd.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 spheres encircle each other and split to form right triangle, 40 miles southeast tucson

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a cigarette and was skywatching as i usually do when i go outside at night. i witnessed a triangle ufo a few months ago and have looked for ufos in the sky ever since. i saw a white light coming towards me very slowly from the north. when it came closer, i realized it was an sphere and not a plane or heli. the object was very bright and about the size of a baseball to my point of veiw. i would say it was about 1000 feet in the air. the object slowly traveled from my left to right and lasted about two minutes. i called for my wife to come out and see it to give me another point of view on what it could be. i decided to go into the house to get my camera and when i came out, the object accelerated very fast to the east and disappeared into the sky. i would of had a great picture if i acted sooner but i was in awe of what i was seeing. the object made no sound at all and it was much closer than planes that fly over which can be easily heard. this is my second close up sighting that i have had in 6 months and i look foward to seeing more.
content.summary: Bright white orb floated in sky and vanished

content.detailedDescription:
Just stepped out on to the porch to talk with the wife and looked up to see this object about 800-1000' feet up.  said hey thats pretty bright for a plane and kept waiting for flashing lights or something. the brightness never changed even though it was moving and never saw the red or blue and white flashing lights. also there was not one bit of sound i thought i would hear something with it being that low but not one sound.
there was another plane about cruising altidude that you could make out its flashing lights it was headed in a more southern direction.  this object was more like dead south-east.  we had crickets chirpping before i spotted the object but during it there was nothing and about a minute or two after it was out of sight they started chirpping again. no smells.  we did have a military jet take off yesterday around 9-930pm out of eugene airport it took off with only it's underbelly red light flashing, maybe has something to do with it?  and for photos just my luck this thing was bright enough you could have used a plain old video cam and picked this thing up but i just happened to have my batteries in a flashlight.   keep them batteries in the camera> thank you<
content.summary: Passed over hwy 99 and roosevelt

content.detailedDescription: I am a correctional officer and had several inmates cutting weeds on the mediums on pine street deming new mexico, while i was looking at an area that i thought needed attention i noticed there was a communications tower as i looked up the tower from my vehicle a sharp bright reflection caught my eye as i looked south high in the sky i saw approx 8 objects just hovering i could barely see them they were so high i first thought they were a flock of birds but the objects were way too high i then thought they were jets but jets don't hover at that altitude , i then proceeded to to grab my binoculars and looked again i had trouble locating the objects but did locate the objects again i saw what looked like triangle shaped with a dark spot very fussy due to the distance, the objects seemed to move from left to right then disappear then reappear the objects were real high and with the supervising of inmates i lost sight.
content.summary: 8 or 9 objects hovering high south of deming during day.

content.detailedDescription:
my dog and i were sitting on the front porch. i facing [ south ]from 

 the porch. when a white [ 2x4 ] came behind the house across the street,

 i thought that was the end about 8 sec later it goes over my house headed

 [ north ] i looked like 2x4 6 foot long all white could not see into.

 aboutely no noise whatever. it did not shake me just wonder.

 has anyone made similar comments ?  looked like 2x4 going thru air.


 see ya,

 christropher seum
content.summary: Has anyone seen this type

content.detailedDescription: It���s ufo?
content.summary: Ufo????

content.detailedDescription: Im going east on ocotillo rd., just before hitting arizona ave. in chandler az. snapped a photo to test my camera and it showed up on my picture with two other objects on top, but it also could be window debris...
content.summary: It showed up on the picture...

content.detailedDescription:
i stepped outside at 5:40 am to have a cigarette and was enjoying a wonderful view or orion's belt slightly south in the sky.  sunlight was not yet coming up from the east so it was nice and dark out.

movement caught my eye directly above my house and i focused in on it.  moving in almost a straight line from east to west was oval shaped object.  it was not a distant object, maybe just above high cloud cover.  there were light on the opposite edges of the peaks of the oval shape.  at first i thought it was just bright coloring on the edges but when it moved over some slight cloud cover west of my house i could see the edges slightly glowing through the clouds.

object was moving extrememly fast.  it moved from directly above my house to the west horizon and out of view within 4-5 seconds.
content.summary: Large oval craft flew over town at 5:45 am

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving alone from ocean city, nj heading west on the atlantic city expressway towards philadelphia and was about 5 miles west of the egg harbor toll plaza.  it was about 10:40 on the morning of saturday, september 5 and it was a beautiful sunny day with a mostly cloudless clear blue sky.  at about a 45 degree angle in the sky directly in front of me (looking west) i observed a small, flat-white object, shaped like a little tophat, appear out of nowhere in the sky.  it descended in an erractic flight pattern for a couple of seconds then disappeared.  a couple seconds later, it reappeared as before, descended in the sky in the same erractic manner for a couple seconds, then disappeared for good.  

i watched the local news that evening to see if there was any coverage of strange ufo-like sightings, but there was none.  i tried to contact the astronomer at the franklin institute to discuss with him, but couldn't find a listing of his email address.  i told my wife of this event and she later happened upon your website from something she had seen in the paper about an upcoming convention.  

what did i think the object was when i first noticed it?  i don't know, but i sure couldn't identify it.  i had seen something like this about 40 years ago when i was about 13 or 14.

ron moser
content.summary: I saw a small white object  against a clear blue sky.  it was shaped like a tophat and flew erratically for a moment, disappeared, then reappeared  before disappearing again.

content.detailedDescription:
About 22:00 i received a call from a friend who lives nearby that they are seeing a weird triangle shaped object on the sky behind their house. 

i grabbed my camera and jumped in to my car and went to my friends house who lives ca 900m from me. 
when i arrived, there were tree people all watching the bright light over the treetops that was on west (it was already dark, the sky was clear and lot of stars were on the sky)

my friend parents were the ones who first discovered the object when being outside, they said, that at first it emitted a strong purple light quite blinding to look and seemed to be a lot closer and about a half of a meter big on the sky, after first discovering it they asked their daughter (my friend) to also come out to look at it.

my friend told that by the time that she arrived she saw three lights that were positioned making a triangle shape and flashed red and purple
tones not on regular manner. lights also seemed to rotate so the triangle formation of the craft was understandable.

by the time i arrived to the scene they had monitored the object for some 15 min and told that it had moved quite a way further (was now viewable about 20cm above treetops, the trees were some 50m from us. so overall, it was some 1,5m above horizon.

we looked the object for some 30 min, and during that time, it was slowly moving away from us to the west and seemed to rotate etc because different colors of lights were seen, it also made sudden erratic movements on several occasions and the observation was turning to be very interesting when out of nowhere bright dots started to be appearing  further away on right side and left side of the object for some time an then vanished.

about 30 min later, the object was moved so far to the west that was dropping behind the treetops, so me and my friend decided to go to the car and drive some 2km futher to the west to the other side of the forest.

we drove to the other side of the forest and parked the car on the side of the road, the object was still viewable, but it was now went much futher away and was noticeable only as a bright dot (about 30cm higher than the horizon) we monitored it for about and hour, and in that time frame it still had periods when it was emitting different kind of colors oand seemed to turn. 

after an about 20min of slowly descending to the horizon, it suddenly made some erratic movements to the right, left and down (felt like filming something bright and then shaking a camera) and was getting brighter again, so we thought it is moving back at us. we were alone on the middle of dark road away from houses and it was getting quite ....Scary :) at this moment.

however, a cloud formation was then coming between the object and us, we watched for about 15min more and then decided to go home, before that however we saw few bright flashes near where the object was, probably so far away and behind the clouds it was not seen any more.

so for a conclusion:

*it was a object with bright lights and shaped like a triangle.

*it was seen on estonia, p���rnu, at around 22:00 on 23.09.2009 moving to the west

*there were four witnesses monitoring the object for about an hour.

*it seemed to turn over it axis at some times and was making sudden "jumps" like it had no weight, so it definitely was not a satellite, plane or anything like that i have previously seen in the sky that was explainable. the witnesses seeing when it was closer said it was a triangle with different colors of bright lights.

*i have about 20min of video footage of that observation, most of it is just black screen with observers comments on the background, it was just so dark that the compact camera had no focus lock, i managed to get some 10-15 seconds of a footage of the bright object after configuring the camera to manual focus lock. it shows a bright flashing dot when zooming in. when i downloaded the video into editing program and sharpened it, then when looking frame by frame there are several frames where there can be seen, that the object had three lights on rectangular shape.
 
*when it was closer, there were some bright dots appearing on the sky near it at times that disappeared after few seconds.

* not knowing how big the object was, i would guess, that when i started observing it it was some 20km away and in the end of it some hundreds of km away. the comment from my friends parents were that at first it was almost straight top of them and was some half a meter long.
content.summary: Triangle hig on sky with green, purple, red lights moving slowly to north. four witnesses, video

content.detailedDescription: I was outside sitting on my porch and i seen a flash on my tree so i looked up and seen a big diamond shaped thing flying through the sky and i was in awe..I hurried up and called my friends over to see it and after maybe 30 seconds it disappered and shot up in the sky and my friend was like wow and fell backwards on a swing and fell off my porch i think it scared him the worest
content.summary: I was sitting out in my yard then i looked up cause i seen a bright light

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my back patio smoking i walked to the end of cement and looked up to see the stars and thats when i seen 3 big red blinking lights in a perfect diamond shape it was high in the sky but lower then the airplane that was flying at the time going the other way also the red lights where bigger then that airplane going the other way,as i was watching these lights i ran back inside to get my boyfriend he came outside to see and it was still there flying or moving slow what ever you would call it we both could not belive what we were seeing and i have never seen anything like that,now i realize i've never seen anything before this ever in my life, i dont know how to explain it but was big.My boyfreind went inside to get his mother they went out the front door im still in the back and still see it.  as it goes farther  away i see the lights go to a straight line i cant believe what i just seen. i've never seen anything in my 42 years on this earth, but i will tell you this now im a believer and i'll be looking up and out there from now on
content.summary: Diamond shape 3 big red blinking lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was photogrphing nightshots and noticed a triangle shape when i put the photo on my pc.
what could it be?
content.summary: Triangle shape in the night over the netherlands

content.detailedDescription: I am reporting this for a co-worker. he was driving on rt. 128 about 4 pm when he saw what looked like a rocket going straight up into the sky leaving a single contrail. he commented that it didn't look like a plane's contrail; it was single and going straight up into the sky. since i am a member of mufon he asked me to see if anyone else reported seeing anything on the monday sept 21st.
content.summary: Missle like object seen leaving a contrail going straight up.

content.detailedDescription:
Murrysville, pennsylvania

ongoing repeated sightings originating from a patch of woods area as viewed and filmed from both sides.  video showing locations in daytime can be viewed here on my youtube.Com channel:  seeingufospa

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=czkjlf7haly
--------------------------------------------------------------------
multiple types seen on now nightly basis:  white, red, orange orbs--sometimes flashing or pulsing.  travel freely through tall thick patches of woods and filmed doing so.
red round one mimics tower beacon, but moving through trees gives it away.
orange ones seen in plasma type form and more solid metallic surface.
white ones seen flashing brightly and traveling through sky with flame-like effect which later morph into fake helicopter on film (september 17th).  dozens of them seen almost every night we look.  they transform into aircraft looking crafts, complete with flashing lights of different colors, usually start off as bright golden orbs low in sky, which hover for a while before transforming.  series of videos regarding such can be partly seen here:

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=hib4hjknhya (part 1)
_______________________________________________

transformer ufos now being seen along with others - 3 times in 4 days.  they first appear moving freely amongst the high trees as white or orange orbs, then rise up above them and transform into what appears to be our aircraft--but they're not. 

september 20, 2009 (pictures with report) - 10:36 pm (farm field) - video here:  http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=ah2xubypwse

september 22, 2009 - 9:27 pm (blackthorn pro shop) - video here:  http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=5v9swilc3zm

september 23, 2009 - 8:45 pm (farm field) - video here:  http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=s4qpdxpgp30

if you only have time to see one video - it is imperative you see this september 23, 2009 video to believe me!.  it transforms into jet plane and you can actually see it spit out a wing which unfolds.  the scary part is they are not only imitating our aircraft looks, but now convincing engine sounds.  presumably so they can fit in, fly unnoticed all around us, without being bothered or shot at. 

smart enough to get here - smart enough to fake us out.
if no one comes here to witness it themselves, they are missing out on the biggest phenomenon in our recent history.  i've provided the locations, shown what they look like, and can spot them... yet no one has even come to see it with us--yet!  (although a few with guts have expressed the desire too & am trying to coordinate a group effort to witness & film them from multiple locations surrounding the area).  we need hi-tech gen3 nightvision zoom lenses (like astrovision) on pro camcorders (like sony's new line with exemor chips) and/or spotlights to get better footage--plus radiation detection and other scientific measuring devices while the activity is going on.  remote battery operated motion sensing equipment too.  i can think of more if you give me time.  i've never seen one actually sitting on the ground and exploration of the overgrown fields & woods with hedge clippers produced no signs of disturbance nor landing.  the "taos hum" low-frequency sound is heard around my house & pro shop at an annoying level for several years--no direction can be determined & not heard by everyone.  photographs of valley on flash reveal multiple orbs and white small "tail" shaped lights frequently also. faint small orbs recorded on nightshot video around us sometimes.  i can see the faint orange orbs drop from the sky occasionally after dusk... my 'military grade' surveillance cam had recorded them before in b/w and i couldn't understand how what i assumed was 'space debris' could be so big as to disappear beyond the treeline which is 500 feet away.  now i know.

sounds too incredible, doesn't it? is no one coming out here because they're afraid?  or is it because i copyright all my work so the ones who charge for this kind of knowledge instead of sharing it for free like me have to pay?  i have shared the footage with all the major tv stations and no one has even acknowledged it. 

it seems the time is ripe for the public to demand answers from the powers that be.
content.summary: Murrysville:  nightly sightings of multiple crafts of different types filmed in hd
